description:
Ardent Global Logistics: Senior Sales Executive - Grow Your Career with a Global Leader

Are you a driven, results-oriented individual with a passion for logistics and building strong relationships?

At Ardent Global Logistics, we're looking for a Senior Sales Executive to join our dynamic team and drive growth in our Global Forwarding (International Air, Ocean & Rail) services.

As a key player in our success, you'll be responsible for securing new profitable and sustainable customers, generating revenue, and presenting innovative solutions to optimize their supply chains.

Here's what you'll do:
• Prospect, plan, and conduct face-to-face meetings with potential customers within your assigned territory.
• Partner with customers to understand their unique needs and tailor solutions leveraging Ardent's comprehensive platform.
• Lead and collaborate with our International Air, Ocean & Rail teams to develop customized solutions that exceed customer expectations.
• Align with branch strategies in forecasting, business planning, and pipeline development.
• Consult with various decision-makers to gain insights into their business challenges and supply chain goals.
• Maintain a strong presence in your local market by participating in relevant events and presentations.
• Collaborate with Account Management to ensure smooth transitions and effective relationship management.
• Contribute to the development of SOPs for efficient customer management.
• What you bring to the table:
• Minimum 4 years of experience in operations within a freight forwarding company or outside sales experience.
• High school diploma or GED is required.
• Willingness to travel within your assigned territory (minimum 3-4 days per week).
• You must have have:
• Advanced knowledge of logistics concepts and supply chain terminology, especially for international freight.
• Excellent communication and presentation skills.
• The ability to multi-task, prioritize, and manage time effectively.
• A knack for persuasion, motivation, and influencing others.
• A passion for building strong relationships across all levels.
• Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite.
• A commitment to diversity and inclusion.
• We don't believe in one-size-fits-all, so if you're excited about this opportunity but don't tick every box, apply anyway! At Ardent, we value potential and are committed to fostering a culture where everyone feels empowered to grow and succeed.

Why Ardent Global Logistics?
• Join a global leader: We're a quickly growing top provider of freight forwarding and logistics solutions, offering a diverse portfolio of services to businesses worldwide.
• Make a real impact: You'll play a vital role in helping our clients achieve their supply chain goals and navigate the complexities of global trade.
• Collaborative and supportive environment: We believe in teamwork and empower our employees to learn, grow, and thrive.
• Competitive compensation and benefits package: We offer a comprehensive package that includes health insurance, paid time off, and more.

Ready to take your career to the next level?

Apply today and join the Ardent team! We look forward to hearing from you.

Additional Information:
• Learn more about Ardent Global Logistics and our commitment to diversity and inclusion on our website: https://ardentgloballogistics.com/
• We are an Equal Opportunity Employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.
•
